history.text: The post seems like a movie that could inspire a lot of thought and emotion considering our current political climate. Do you agree?
Exactly, in our current situation it is very relevant
our president wants to call out news for being "fake"
I have yet to see it but it's top on my list. I think the more people who view this film, it could encourage others to challenge the government, which is very much needed today
Meryl Streep was very outspoken about it in an acceptance speach
she will influence others
He hates "fake" news because he can't handle the truth. Meryl streep is brilliant
This movie has done well
I Agree, it seems like we are moving backward instead of forward
I don't think there are enough political movies
This is true do you think producers are afraid to make these kinds of movies?
tom hanks is also a strong actor
I would say yes, many are probably fearful.
However, Spielberg is a legend and wouldnt take it on if it wasnt worth doing
it seems as though the critics are largely in support of this film and it's delivery
i know for sure it is under rated
also historical/political movies are rare
especially now in days
no one takes interest in them because they seem "boring"
the article references great acting which doesn't surprise me considering the well known cast
very true people have "expectations" with the cast
really makes you wake up and see just how corrupt everything is
I am unfamiliar with the "pentagon papers"
crazy, the truth will somehow come out and they try to shut down the source, really makes you think what they could be hiding
i was unaware that eiseinberg was involved in the leaking of the document
did he have a big role?
the article references his political involvement with the post in 1966
oh yes true, so do you agree with history tends to repeat itself?
i agree and i seems as if the critics who've reviewed this film agree
I was unaware that this movie touches on supreme court hearings regarding the first amendment
and you know meryl's character was the first female publisher of a newspaper that big
i look forward to seeing this movie
i am unfamiliar with nixons historical involvement in this
do you find this to be a movie you would like to see?
i do too reading this made it interesting, but also afraid
ignorance is a bliss
how about you?
i agree the more i read on this the more interested i am
thanks for chatting

uid2response.feedback: I will be going to see this movie after doing this activity.
